name: HCC Open Hotel

reviews.title: City Break Stay
reviews.text: We celebrated my husbands 50th birthday in this fabulous city! The hotel lived up to its expectations - the staff were very friendly and helpful. The room was very clean and the linen immaculate. The air conditioning was efficient and the breakfast was excellent. We requested extra pillows and within 5 minutes our request was granted.

The only down side was the distance from the Ramblas - it was a fairly long walk but taxis are fairly reasonable. However, Barcelona FC was only a very short distance and was the highlight of our stay!!!!
reviews.title: Hum Drum Hubbub with a Hike

reviews.text: We picked the weekend of the festival of St John (we didn't know at the time of the booking) and the fireworks continued until about 5 am!!
reviews.title: Great base to discover Barcelona

reviews.text: We would definitely recommend this friendly hotel to anyone wanting a long weekend in Barcelona.
reviews.title: Nice Modern Hotel in decent location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here with a friend, in the last month for a long weekend. Room was on 7th floor, fine and functional, the bar was a morgue thoughout our stay, and as it was simply a counter ajoining the eating area, it didn't really feel like a bar. So.. this meant the hotel was simply a bed and shower to us. It was quite a hike from the hotel to Las Ramblas; the Gothic area; or the more old-city part of town that I imagine most tourist would want to visit. It is about 70m from the main thoroughfare and 300m from the metro though, which eases the pain somewhat.
reviews.title: A very good hotel

likes.disliked: — Check in was a bit slow

reviews.text: I stayed at the HCC Open with my parents (senior citizens) and had a great stay. Ten minutes after we arrived at Barcelona Estacion del Norte bus station, my mother's handbag with ALL her documents got stolen (side note: beware of the rampant theft problems in Barcelona and keep your stuff in a money belt or other secure location..). After a long couple of hours spent at the police station and then scouring the station trying to locate the purse possibly discarded after the cash was taken out, the HCC Open was a nice place to come and take a breather. The staff at the front desk (who spoke great English) were pretty helpful with the whole situation.
reviews.title: Great hotel no problems with the location

likes.liked: — Room quality, service, proximity to metro

reviews.text: We got a triple room with 2 double beds for a great price. The room was clean and when we had problems with our TV, the staff immediately sent someone up to fix it. The restaurant food is reasonably priced and decent, and there is internet connectivity (though it will cost you 3.50 for 15 minutes).
reviews.title: Good Hotel, Not so good location

reviews.text: In terms of location, the HCC is a little bit away from Las Ramblas and on a Sunday/late nights there isn't much open near the hotel by way of restaurants or shops. However, the Rocafort metro stop is a stone's throw away from the hotel and you can basically get anywhere more interesting within 5-10 minutes. I've stayed in Las Ramblas during a previous visit to Barcelona and found it to get a bit noisy/rowdy during the weekends and thus decided to try something a little out of the city for my parents to get a good nights' sleep. I think it was a wise decision!
reviews.title: Modern hotel

likes.liked: — Friendly staff, clean and spacious rooms

reviews.text: All in all, this is a great hotel and unless you're particular about staying in the centre of things, I would recommed it without any hesitation!
reviews.title: An absolulte bargain

likes.disliked: — Late check-in time (bit this is common in Spain)

description: The hotel is situated in the middle of the Eixample district, beside Plaza España and the Fira trade fair grounds and just a few minutes from Plaza Catalunya. It occupies a new building, which was constructed in 2004. Hotel HCC Open is one of the latest additions to our hotel chain and therefore combines all the amenities you would expect of a modern hotel. This, together with its perfect location, make it an excellent choice for a pleasant stay in Barcelona.
